Interface ScoringStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardScoringStrategy
public interface ScoringStrategy
Strategy interface for different scoring algorithms.

Implementations define how many points should be gained or lost for a given question value and whether the answer was correct. This allows the scoring behavior to be swapped without changing game logic.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    calculateScore(int questionValue, boolean isCorrect)
    Calculates the score delta for a question attempt.
    String
    getStrategyName()
    Returns a human-readable name for this scoring strategy.

  • Method Details

    • calculateScore

      int calculateScore(int questionValue, boolean isCorrect)
      Calculates the score delta for a question attempt.
      Parameters:
      questionValue - the base value of the question (typically positive)
      isCorrect - true if the answer is correct, false if it is incorrect
      Returns:
      the number of points to apply: positive to add, negative to subtract, zero for no change

    • getStrategyName

      String getStrategyName()
      Returns a human-readable name for this scoring strategy.
      Returns:
      the strategy name (e.g. "Standard Scoring")
